pages.text: Just as natural forces may sometimes prove insufficient, white chalk may fall short where the intervention of infernal powers is required. $(br2)Crafted using components harvested from the Nether, this chalk is an essential requisite for performing rituals that engage with the Hellish realms or their denizens.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Crimson chalk, like any other colored chalk, is created based on ordinary white chalk.
